Work Experience

Data Analyst

Mid-Atlantic Permanente Medical Group

Jun 2022 - Present

  • Data Analyst, Financial and Operational Department
  • Working Tools: Python, Oracle, SQL Server, SAS, Tableau, Excel
  • Responsibilities and achievements:
    • Optimized database triggers and stored procedures for the budgeting tool and collaborated with the software development team to enhance the front-end functionality, resulting in improved efficiency and accuracy of roster and panel size management
    • Conducted data cleaning and exploratory data analysis on a large dataset, and designed interactive Tableau dashboards to support regional executive decision-making on service distribution and capital planning
    • Created effective Python and SAS programs and macros to meet requests from regional specialty departments, streamlining data analysis and reporting processes for internal clients and resulting in a 40% reduction in reporting time
    • Led the team-level transition from SAS to Python, resulting in a 50% increase in programming efficiency and a 30% decrease in programming errors
  • Website

Data Engineer

Massive Data Institute

Sep 2021 - May 2022

  • Data Engineer, Web-Crawling & Digital Data Collection Team
  • Working Tools: Python, AWS, Git, Docker, MongoDB
  • Responsibilities and achievements:
    • Designed and implemented three end-to-end pipelines to automate the storage of images, files, and raw text scraped from websites into a MongoDB database on Docker
    • Collaborated with a cross-functional team to design and initiate a large-scale data collection campaign to gather information from 100,000 major U.S. public schools
    • Released an alpha version of Crawl4All ,a web interface and application for automated web scraping, and documented the entire development process
  • Website

Data Analyst

DiDi Global Inc.

Apr 2021 - Jul 2021

  • Data Analyst Intern, International Business Group
  • Working Tools: Python, SQL, Excel, Tableau
  • Responsibilities and achievements:
    • Collected and analyzed 30 key performance indicators from 60 million overseas user trip records, identifying abnormal fluctuations and developing strategies to improve user experience
    • Automated manual reporting processes by creating interactive Tableau reports using Python and SQL, reducing labor costs by 75% and improving efficiency
    • Proactively coordinated with product managers across the organization to streamline data-related processes in product experiments, including troubleshooting A/B testing, correcting data inconsistencies, and developing new indicators
  • Website

Research Assistant

China Merchants Securities

Dec 2020 - Mar 2021

  • Research Assistant, Research and Development Center
  • Working Tools: Excel, Wind, Bloomberg
  • Responsibilities and achievements:
    • Maintained and organized an internal real estate database, processed national-level data to analyze land market conditions, and applied this information to forecast performance in the next quarter
    • Designed and produced an in-depth industrial research report about Chinese REITs, focusing on their structure, operations, and the long-term impacts of policy changes on them
    • Co-authored an assessment of the Chinese real estate industry, by analyzing the effects of urbanization on supply and demand, and evaluating stock performance indicators and their effect on the market
